title: Sip, Shimmer & Holiday Sparkle! | Full Face Makeup | The Hill - Midtown East
desc: We are official in the cozy Fall season and that means we have lots of Holidays to prepare for! Something about the Holiday Season makes us want to sparkle and put an extra bit of glam in every party we attend! You will learn how to turn your look from sexy to sparkly and your Instructor will teach you how to transform your look to adapt to any party - be it a work function or heading out with your man for New Year's Eve - kiss proof lips of course.??This is a special class where you will learn everything for your full face - from a sexy smokey eye to contouring and highlighting - even foundation and lips too.?This is a great event to attend for all of your Holiday makeup needs - whether you are dressing up for family gatherings or for your special Glam Holiday parties - you are sure to turn heads and add sparkle anywhere you go. We?ve Got it Covered!?Tonight You Will Learn: ~~~ We Suggest You Bring:? Items Provided For You To Use & To Keep: ``` (Please arrive at this event with no makeup one - for those coming from work, makeup remover is available for your use.)
